mapper.select: select st_grade.stuNumber,st_grade.couId,st_name.name,st_course.couName,grade,point,st_course.major from st_course,st_name,st_grade where st_grade.stuNumber=st_name.stuNumber and st_grade.couId=st_course.couId
select * from score where name=#{searchContent} or stuNumber=#{searchContent} or couName=#{searchContent} or major=#{searchContent}
mapper.delete: delete from st_grade where couId=#{couId} and stuNumber=#{stuNumber}
mapper.select: SELECT st_course.couId,st_course.couName FROM st_course WHERE (major='通识教育' OR major=#{major}) AND st_course.couID NOT IN( SELECT couID FROM st_grade WHERE stuNumber=#{stuNumber})
mapper.insert: insert into st_grade(stuNumber, couId, grade, point) VALUES (#{stuNumber},#{couId},#{grade},#{point})
mapper.select: select * from st_grade where stuNumber=#{stuNumber} and couId=#{couId}
mapper.update: update st_grade set grade=#{grade},point=#{point} where couId=#{couId} and stuNumber=#{stuNumber}
